original_text:
And I will encamp against you all around,
    and will besiege you with towers
    and I will raise siegeworks against you.
korean_text: 내가 너를 사면으로 둘러 진을 치며 너를 에워 대를 쌓아 너를 치리니

sentences.original_text: And I will encamp against you all around
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너를 사방으로 진 치고

sentences.original_text: and will besiege you with towers
and I will raise siegeworks against you.
